response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price tailored just for you. Given its immense value to you, we propose to sell it to you for $14,000. This is a special opportunity that reflects both the high quality of the product and your appreciation for it. We believe this price offers a great balance between value and cost, ensuring that you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the return on our investment. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations, and we would be delighted to proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
